Package org.opends.server.tools

Class RestoreDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.tasks.TaskTool
      • org.opends.server.tools.RestoreDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskScheduleInformation
    public class RestoreDB
extends TaskTool
    This program provides a utility that may be used to restore a binary backup of a Directory Server backend generated using the BackUpDB tool. This will be a process that is intended to run separate from Directory Server and not internally within the server process (e.g., via the tasks interface).
